author: markt
msg: Add support for trailing headers in chunked HTTP requests. The header length is limited to 8192 by default and the limit can be changed via a system property. markt/kkolinko

author: philip
msg: (get_info_for_copy): Examine the base node when it is deleted.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3359: Added separator option to ftp producer to dictate what path separator to use when uploading files.

msg: [KARAF-299] Fix search for a given bundle and the list of features
